/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, looking towards the horizon. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun is shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. On either side of the road, there are trees and power lines, adding a touch of urban life to the natural beauty. The road itself curves gently to the right, leading the viewer's eye towards the horizon. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and grass contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
